photos.summary: On July 15, 2024, near Golden Gate Park in San Francisco, John and his sister Anna set up a picnic blanket outdoors.
where: Golden Gate Park, San Francisco, CA
photos.what: Setting up a picnic blanket together before the picnic began.

photos.summary: On July 15, 2024, at Golden Gate Park, Anna poured orange juice while John took a selfie during a brunch picnic.
where: Golden Gate Park, San Francisco, CA
photos.what: Anna pouring orange juice; John taking a selfie; clarified as a brunch picnic.

conversation.user: We had brunch food, not lunch.

photos.summary: On July 15, 2024, at Golden Gate Park's rose garden, John's friend Miguel arrived and joined John and Anna.
where: Golden Gate Park, San Francisco, CA
photos.what: Friends gathering near the rose garden. Miguel arrived around 12:30 after work.

conversation.user: Miguel showed up around 12:30 after work.

qas.question: Who was John with at the beginning of the picnic?
